thread.title_full: JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong Introduces Attractive Room Offer For Social Event Group BookingsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong Introduces Attractive Room Offer For Social Event Group BookingsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong Introduces Attractive Room Offer For Social Event Group Bookings
Hong Kong â€“ JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong is pleased to introduce preferred room rates for social events that require accommodat ion for overseas guests.
Whether it is for a wedding, birthday or anniversary celebrat ion, with a minimum of 10 guestrooms and above, the deal will offer an ideal opt ion for your guests to enjoy a stylish stay in the heart of Hong Kong at attract ive rates.
Valid for bookings before 31 August 2016, with stay period from now to 31 December 2016, the room rates are as follows:
Weekday (Monday to Thursday) From *HK$2,400 Per Room Per Night Weekend (Friday to Sunday) From *HK$2,200 Per Room Per Night
Located in the prest igious Pacific Place complex, with popular local attract ions and cultural landmarks nearby, the hotel is just a 2 minute walk to the nearest MTR (Mass Transit Railway), making it easy to get around. Enjoy direct access to Pacific Place Shopping Mall, which features over 150 shops, restaurants and a Cineplex.
Terms and Conditions
Offer is valid for bookings from now to 31 August 2016, with stay period between now and 31 December 2016 Applicable to a minimum of 10 guestrooms and above Rates are subject to 10% service charge Confirmation of room booking is subject to availability at the point of booking Offer is valid for new guestroom bookings only Offer is non-commissionable All guestroom charges must be settled upon checkout Offer cannot be used in conjunction with other promotional offers, discounts or vouchers
Source:- Marriott
